title: Machine Learning-Based Analysis Training for Developing and Validating Nutritional Frailty Phenotypes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis and programming understanding (Python/R), experience in health data processing
context.additional_context: Practical skills enhancement through hands-on education using digital devices (tablets/laptops), analyzing real-world elderly health data in project-based learning.

learning_goals: Can explain the process of selecting predictive variables for nutritional frailty using Lasso regression
Can practice procedures for developing nutritional frailty phenotypes using Random Forest and XGBoost models
Can verify associations between frailty phenotypes and health outcomes (mortality/disability rates) through Poisson regression analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
